Tomcat Performance Concerns
[thread]
How do I increase performance on Tomcat?
Other (non-exhaustive) notes:
Stress test your app. You can do this via JMeter, siege, flood, and other tools. Google is your friend.
Tweak you unix box! Look at ulimit and kernel parameters.
Bad design will hurt performance.
Look at JProbe, or OptimizeIt, or other profiling tools. Lots of people recommend these tools. This is not an endorsement for them, I just notice other people like them.
